properties.title: Rosenlauibiwak SAC
properties.abstract: Open during the ski touring season. 11 Mattresses, wool blankets and tableware available. No oven, no cooking facilities.
properties.description: The crimson painted shelter made of metal serves ski mountaineers on their way to the Wetterhorn and Rosenhorn area; it is closed in summer. The simple shelter is the winter alternative to the summer cabin on Tossengrat. Constructed on stilts on the verge of a talus, the small shelter without electric light and heating is nestled against the rocks on the summer access trail from Rosenlaui to Dossenh√ºtte.
